cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.NI. 

The paper deals with coding theory and storage systems, which are typically studied in the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Data Structures (cs.DS) sub-categories. The paper also discusses the trade-off between storage size and repair bandwidth, which is a topic studied in Distributed Computing (cs.DC) and Systems and Control (cs.SI) sub-categories. Finally, the paper presents error correction algorithms, which are typically studied in the Network and Internet Architecture (cs.NI) sub-category.
